hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /mnt export BUILD_ID=$BUILD_ID sudo -E /opt/vappio-util/vp-build $IMAGE_NAME clovr-build echo "Enabling updates and hudson start at boot" buildname=`echo "$BUILD_ID" | sed 's/_/-/'` namepfx="$b-$buildname" mkdir -p $namepfx/shared/user-scripts echo '#!/bin/bash' > $namepfx/user-scripts/01-updaterecipts echo '/opt/vappio-install/vp-bootstrap-install' >> $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/01-updaterecipts echo '#!/bin/bash' > $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/02-starthudson echo '/etc/init.d/hudson start' >> $namepfx/shared/user-scripts/02-starthudson tar -cvzf $namepfx.tgz $namepfx || true
